Title: Small Potatoes
Plot: Five babies in the same town are all born with tails and the local OB-GYN is blamed for tampering with fertilized eggs. However, Mulder discovers the culprit to be a simple man with a genetic deformity who may have the ability to alter his appearance.
GuestStars: Robert Rozen, Paul McGillion, Jennifer Sterling, David Cameron, Forbes Angus, Peter Kelamis, P. Lynn Johnson, Carrie Cain Sparks, Darin Morgan, Christine Cavanaugh, Lee De Broux
